General.Name: Baird Medical Investment Holdings Limited
General.Description: Baird Medical Investment Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in research and development, manufacturing, and sales of microwave ablation and other medical devices in the People's Republic of China. It offers microwave ablation apparatus and needles, as well as microwave ablation apparatus approved for the treatment of live cancer and thyroid nodules, long microwave ablation needles, and fine microwave ablation needles through third-party distributors. Baird Medical Investment Holdings Limited was founded in 2012 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

0.Name: Ms. Haimei  Wu
0.Title: Chairwoman of the Board of Directors & CEO
